title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 49-1.5 - Loss of Eligibility and Removal
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 49-1.5 - Loss of Eligibility and Removal

State Regulations

The department may remove an institution from approval to
operate under SARA, based on a finding that the institution is no longer
eligible or is out of compliance with SARA policies and standards. Within 10
days of the date of the written notification of disapproval, the institution
may appeal such disapproval to the Commissioner or his/her designee in a manner
prescribed by the Commissioner. An institution that is removed from eligibility
during an approval period shall receive no fee refund, except as otherwise
provided in section
49-1.7
of this

Subpart. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
§§
49-1.5

Adopted

New

Amended

New

York State Register December 30, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 52, eff. 12/30/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
